title: OCR API Service
shortDescription: High-throughput Optical Character Recognition service designed for extracting text from images at scale.
fullDescription: A robust, production-ready OCR API built with Python and FastAPI. It utilizes a Redis-based job queue to handle high-volume concurrent requests efficiently. The system is containerized with Docker for consistent deployment and scalability.
highlights: Asynchronous job processing with Redis queue
Comprehensive API documentation with Swagger UI

codeSnippet.code:
@app.post('/ocr/submit')
async def submit_job(file: UploadFile, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks):
    job_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
    image_bytes = await file.read()
    
    # Enqueue job to Redis
    await redis_client.lpush('ocr_queue', json.dumps({'id': job_id, 'data': base64.b64encode(image_bytes).decode()}))
    
    return {'job_id': job_id, 'status': 'queued'}
